headerDisplay: An account to link your [ADT Pulse](https://portal.adtpulse.com/) system to Homebridge is required. This will be used to control your security panel and read sensor status.
footerDisplay: If you need assistance, you may read the [plugin instructions](https://github.com/mrjackyliang/homebridge-adt-pulse#readme) or feel free to [create a bug report](https://github.com/mrjackyliang/homebridge-adt-pulse/issues/new?template=bug_report.md).

name.title: Name
name.description: Plugin name as displayed in the Homebridge log

username.title: Username
username.description: Email address used for ADT Pulse login

password.title: Password
password.description: Password used for ADT Pulse login

logLevel.title: Log Level
logLevel.description: Higher levels mean more logs will show. Turn on Homebridge Debug Mode for levels 40 and 50. Recommended setting is "Info (Level 30)"
